subject: Re: Order #SSN3655, how did it go?
description_text:
Hey,

The elastomers are Nice i prefer the red and blue ones. But my spring
holder is broken so I cannot usw my spring.

SIMSONN <no-reply@loox.io> schrieb am Do. 11. Dez. 2025 um 14:36:

> Hello Eric, We would be grateful if you shared how things look and feel.
> Your review helps us and the community that supports us, and it only takes
> a few
